projects.title: Notification Management (Microservice)
projects.summary: Notification management service used to send real-time alerts to business users.
bullets: Designed and developed REST APIs in .NET Core within a microservices architecture (ABP Framework, EF Core).
Implemented asynchronous communication with RabbitMQ to deliver real-time notifications reliably.
Fixed bugs and improved service stability.

projects.title: Bconnect (Web ERP)
projects.summary: Web ERP solution designed to provide advanced, integrated control of commercial management and inventory, enabling real-time monitoring and optimized operations.
bullets: Contributed to technical design and actively participated in Scrum ceremonies (facilitation/discussions).
Analyzed requirements and designed the SQL Server database.
Developed backend services using .NET (Web API architecture).
Developed the frontend using Angular.
Performed quality audits, participated in code reviews, and improved overall maintainability.
Fixed bugs and improved application stability.
Automated, validated, and integrated business data flows.

projects.title: Bconnect (Mobile)
projects.summary: Mobile application used to track customer pre-orders and deliveries.
bullets: Contributed to technical design and actively participated in Scrum meetings.
Developed backend services using .NET (Web API architecture).
Developed the mobile app using Xamarin.Forms (Android / iOS).
Implemented local data persistence using SQLite.
Performed quality audits, participated in code reviews, and improved maintainability.
Fixed bugs and improved application stability.

projects.title: Time & Attendance Tracking System
projects.summary: Web-based time management solution providing centralized control of attendance, schedules, and employee activity. Real-time check-in/out tracking with automated handling of late arrivals, absences, and overtime.
bullets: Developed backend features using PHP.
Built frontend functionality with JavaScript and jQuery.
Performed quality checks and participated in code reviews.
Fixed bugs and improved overall stability.
